message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $140 for it.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I understand your position, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $142 for the product.
I can see you're serious about the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $143?
